snippet.title: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii launches February 21, 2025 on PS5, PS4, PC, Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox One!

Pre-order any edition (Standard, Deluxe, Collector’s) and get the Ichiban Kasuga Pirate Crew & Special Outfit to add Ichiban and his pet crawfish Nancy to your pirate crew, and two of Ichiban's iconic outfits.
 
Get all the booty when you upgrade to the Digital Deluxe Edition or Collector's Edition that unlocks legendary crewmates, additional ship customization parts, iconic costumes, an extra karaoke song, more music to add to your in-game playlist, and more!

PS5/PS4: https://store.playstation.com/product/JP0177-PPSA24478_00-MAINGAME00000000
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3061810/Like_a_Dragon_Pirate_Yakuza_in_Hawaii
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9NS00HQCZ0CJ
